page.title: 20St.Gabriel's School Viewpark
page.content:
St.Gabriel's Primary is the smallest of the four in our area. We have ten classes; four of them are in huts next to the playground. Most of the pupils come from the council hous- es around the school,although a few travel from further away. Some parents come into the school to help with craft work. Others go out with teachers and children to help supervise. Parents also join in choir pracitice for religious services.
Group credits: Angela,Darren,Kenny, Kirsty,Paul,Joanne,Linda,Gillian, Mark,Nicole,Julie,Stephen,John,Ben, Geraldine,Michelle,Mr.Smith. (St. Gabriel's P.S., Viewpark.)
